definitions.body: :La 4:8 outline, form (Ph. [[תאר]]; acc. to Schwally:Idiot. 100 prop. something gazed at, from √ [[תאר]] = ChrPal Aram. t0r gaze at);—´[[ת]]: abs. Ge 29:17 +; cstr. Ju Jdg 8:18; sf. [[תּֽׂאֲרוֹ]] (Ges:§ 93 q) Is 52:14, [[תָּאֳרוֹ]] 1Sa 28:14;—form, of woman, ´[[יְפַת תּ]]: Ge 29:17 (E; + [[מַרְאֶה]], ‖ later [[חֶלֶם וּדְמוּת]] Ge 1:26, Lag:Or. ii. 62; BN 149), Es 2:7 (+ id.), 1Sa 25:3, De 21:11; of man, ´[[יְפֵה־ת]]: Ge 39:11 (J; + [[מַרְאֶה]]), cf. Is 52:14 ( + id.), Is 53:2 (+ id., [[הָדָר]]), Ju Jdg 8:18, so also 1Ch 17:17 (for MT [[הור]]) Klo Perles:Anal. 68; ´[[אִישׁ ת]]: 1Sa 16:18, ´[[טוֹב־ת]]: 1Ki 1:6; [[מַה־תָּאֳרוֹ]] 1Sa 28:14; v. La 4:8 (where by metonymy = aspect, visage); of cattle, ´[[וִיפוֹת ת]]: Ge 41:18 (E), ´[[רָעוֹת ת]]: v:Ge 41:19 (E); tree, [[זַיִת רַעֲנׇן יְפֵה]] ´[[פְרִי־ת]]: Je 11:16 (Du ´[[יְפֵיפֵה ת]]:, v. 46:20).
